titles.title: Distributed Generation Promotion Act of 2000
To provide for the interconnection of distributed generation facilities with local electric distribution systems, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 10/12/2000--Introduced. Distributed Generation Promotion Act of 2000 - Amends the Federal Power Act to require a local distribution company to interconnect its own local distribution facilities with those of a distributed generation facility if such facility: (1) pays the just, reasonable, and nondiscriminatory interconnection costs determined by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC); and (2) complies with final FERC rules pertaining to safety, reliability, and power quality standards.
